monster.name: Awakened Shrub
monster.languages: one language known by its creator

trait.name: False Appearance
trait.text: While the shrub remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from a normal shrub.

action.name: Rake
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +1 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 1 (1d4 - 1) slashing damage.

monster.description: An awakened shrub is an ordinary shrub given sentience and mobility by the awaken spell or similar magic.Source: Monster Manual p. 317, Storm King's Thunder, Waterdeep: Dungeon of the Mad Mage, Infernal Machine Rebuild, Mythic Odysseys of Theros, Icewind Dale: Rime of the Frostmaiden
